results.content: Rather quick, but helpful and focussed to the essential. In my opinion rather for intermediate level than for beginners who are not familiar with Wordpress at all.
results.content_html: Rather quick, but helpful and focussed to the essential. In my opinion rather for intermediate level than for beginners who are not familiar with Wordpress at all.

results.content: My experience was great. AlthoughI've been using Enfold for a few years now, I was still able to learn a few new tricks in order to enhance my skill set. Definitely take this course if you need help with Enfold.
results.content_html: My experience was great. AlthoughI've been using Enfold for a few years now, I was still able to learn a few new tricks in order to enhance my skill set. Definitely take this course if you need help with Enfold.

results.content: I think the presenter could slow down and make it clearer what he is doing on each step.
results.content_html: I think the presenter could slow down and make it clearer what he is doing on each step.

results.content: Everything is clearly explained. This course helps me to understand what I can do with enfold, which is why I bought it in the first place.

response.content: Hey Terry - Thank you so much for the complete review I really appreciate it. Please let me know if you have any questions and I'm very glad to hear you found this course helpful! Thanks - Raleigh
